name: Extraordinary Cheese Dip™
description: This is one of Epicure's most requested recipes, featuring CCB, Lemon Dilly, and 3 Onion. It's a surefire crowd pleaser that can be made in under 10 minutes using the microwave (see Tip below)!

ingredients.name: Extraordinary Trio
ingredients.quantity: All these are available in the

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 350° F.
  2. Combine cream cheese, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, CCB Dip Mix, Lemon Dilly Dip Mix, and 3 Onion Dip Mix until well blended and spoon into a heat-proof serving dish.
  3. Bake, uncovered, 15 min, or until heated through and bubbling.
  4. Serve with veggies and crackers.
tips: Slash cooking time by using the microwave! Cover and microwave on medium-high, at 2 min intervals, stirring in between, until hot and bubbly.
